## Overview

Data cleaning is a crucial step in any epidemiological analysis. Before you can analyze your data, you need to ensure it is properly formatted, validated, and ready for analysis. This involves handling missing values, standardizing formats, validating data quality, and preparing data for epidemiological analysis.

## Learning Objectives

- Clean messy datasets
- Validate data quality
- Handle missing values
- Standardize data formats
- Prepare data for epidemiological analysis

## Example Dataset
